actions.name: AddAttachmentsToSet
actions.description: Adds one or more attachments to an AWS Support case.

actions.name: AddCommunicationToCase
actions.description: Adds a customer communication to an AWS Support case.

actions.name: CreateCase
actions.description: Creates a new AWS Support case.

actions.name: DescribeAttachment
actions.description: Returns the description for an attachment.

actions.name: DescribeCaseAttributes
actions.description: This is an internally managed function which allows secondary services to read AWS Support case attributes.

actions.name: DescribeCases
actions.description: Returns a list of AWS Support cases that matches the given inputs.

actions.name: DescribeCommunications
actions.description: Returns the communications and attachments for one or more AWS Support cases.

actions.name: DescribeIssueTypes
actions.description: Returns issue types for AWS Support cases.

actions.name: DescribeServices
actions.description: Returns the current list of AWS services and categories that applies to each service.

actions.name: DescribeSeverityLevels
actions.description: Returns the list of severity levels that can be assigned to an AWS Support case.

actions.name: DescribeSupportLevel
actions.description: Returns the support level for an AWS Account identifier.

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorCheckRefreshStatuses
actions.description: Returns the status of a Trusted Advisor refresh check based on a list of check identifiers.

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorCheckResult
actions.description: Returns the results of the Trusted Advisor check that has the specified check identifier.

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorCheckSummaries
actions.description: Returns the summaries of the results of the Trusted Advisor checks that have the specified check identifiers.

actions.name: DescribeTrustedAdvisorChecks
actions.description: Returns a list of all available Trusted Advisor checks, including name, identifier, category and description.

actions.name: InitiateCallForCase
actions.description: This is an internally managed function to initiate a call on AWS Support Center.

actions.name: InitiateChatForCase
actions.description: This is an internally managed function to initiate a chat on AWS Support Center.

actions.name: PutCaseAttributes
actions.description: This is an internally managed function which allows secondary services to attach attributes to AWS Support cases.

actions.name: RateCaseCommunication
actions.description: Rate an AWS Support case communication.

actions.name: RefreshTrustedAdvisorCheck
actions.description: Requests a refresh of the Trusted Advisor check that has the specified check identifier.

actions.name: ResolveCase
actions.description: Resolves an AWS Support case.

actions.name: SearchForCases
actions.description: Returns a list of AWS Support cases that matches the given inputs.
